name: Zed Survival
description:
Create your character and survive wave after wave of zombies!
Gain exp, level up and unlock new skills.
Visit the shop between waves to buy weapons, ammo and other useful items.
Explore further to get exp bonuses and better loot.
How many Zeds can you kill before your inevitable demise?Features:
  • Character customization menu
  • Exp levelling system
  • Increasingly difficult wave based survival
  • 10+ different Zombie Types
  • 20+ Weapons
  • Turrets
  • Different rarities for weapons (eg. Common, Rare, Legendary)
  • Throwables such as Grenades, Throwing Knives, Molotovs
  • 4 Different stages with different "boss rounds"
  • A shop to buy weapons, ammo and more!
